meanings.definition: A traditional Indian dance performed by women.
meanings.sent1: During the festival, the women showcased their nautches with grace.
meanings.sent2: The nautches at the wedding were mesmerizing and colorful.
meanings.sent3: The nautches at the party made everyone want to join in and dance.
meanings.sent4: Her nautches were like poetry in motion, captivating all who watched.
meanings.sent5: The nautches told stories through movement, enchanting the audience.

meanings.definition: A type of entertainment involving dancing and music in South Asia.
meanings.sent1: The lively nautches at the cultural event brought joy to all.
meanings.sent2: In South Asia, nautches are a popular form of entertainment.
meanings.sent3: The street performers put on nautches that had everyone clapping along.
meanings.sent4: The rhythmic beats of the nautches echoed through the night.
meanings.sent5: The colorful costumes added to the festive atmosphere of the nautches.
